entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:37 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 09:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Humidity: 94 %

Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: W 17 km/h gust 36 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing this morning. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning then becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
